title: U.S. Treasury official sees modest uptick in crypto illicit finance, but transactions small - Reuters
content: U.S. Treasury official sees modest uptick in crypto illicit finance, but transactions small  Reuters
description: U.S. officials have observed an uptick in the use of digital assets to facilitate illicit finance since Russia invaded Ukraine, but the transaction volume is too small to play a big role in helping Moscow evade sweeping sanctions, a senior Treasury official said on Friday.
